title: Mediterranean inspired fish stew
ingredients: ['little olive, vegetable or sunflower oil', '1 large onion, roughly chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced or pressed', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 red pepper', '1/2 green pepper', '1/2 yellow or orange pepper', '2 teaspoons mixed dried herbs', '1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes or chilli powder', '1 glass white wine', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '500g meaty white fish, such as coley or monkfish', '100ml hot water', 'parsley to garnish', '1 pinch salt and pepper']
